wiki.content: Fly Away is the fourth single by american rock musician Lenny Kravitz from his 1998 album 5. It is one of Kravitz's most successful songs to date. The song was a hit in both the united kingdom and united states. It topped the uk Singles Chart while in usa it reached #12 on the Billboard Hot 100, and topped both the Mainstream Rock Tracks and Modern Rock Tracks charts. In new zealand it peaked at #8 and was certified gold. The song also helped to expand the success of his album 5 in europe and earned Kravitz a grammy Award in 1999 for Best Male Rock Performance. User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License and may also be available under the GNU FDL.
wiki.summary: Fly Away is the fourth single by american rock musician Lenny Kravitz from his 1998 album 5. It is one of Kravitz's most successful songs to date. The song was a hit in both the united kingdom and united states. It topped the uk Singles Chart while in usa it reached #12 on the Billboard Hot 100, and topped both the Mainstream Rock Tracks and Modern Rock Tracks charts. In new zealand it peaked at #8 and was certified gold.
